title: 18-year-old Swiss Rider Muriel Furrer Dies after Crash at Zürich Worlds
content:
Officials confirm 18-year-old Swiss racer died Friday from 'a serious head injury' suffered in a crash during the junior women's road race.

Read the full article at 18-year-old Swiss Rider Muriel Furrer Dies after Crash at Zürich Worlds on Velo.
author: ahood
